tool_description:
AppsBuilder is a do it yourself platform for mobile applications development. No coding skills are needed! Trough a single building process users can create an app for iOS (iPad, iPhone/iPod), Android (Tablets & Phones) and Windows Phone. Last but not least, your app will be available for the Chrome Web Store and with a Mobile Site Html5 version.

All content is stored on Cloud, enabling real time updates.

All JSON structures can also be retrieved here: https://appsbuilder.atlassian.net/wiki/display/res/App+JSON
name: AppsBuilder
title: AppsBuilder

api_list.name: Get User Themes
api_list.description: Allows a user to retrieve its own custom Themes. Returns an hash of Themes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/style/getUserThemes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/style/getUserThemes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Clone App
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to clone one of his apps. Returns the newly created app ID or "false".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/cloneApp/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/cloneApp/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check Feed URL
api_list.description: Returns all the available feed contents from the passed URL

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: This is the URL to search the content from.

api_list.name: Delete Feed
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to delete one of his feeds. Returns "1" on success.

api_list.name: Build App
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to compile and create the package of one of his apps, for a specific device type. Returns a JSON with the position of the app in the building queue on success, or an error message (for e.g. in case the app has already been inserted in the queue). The “Is Building” function should be used to test building procedure completion.

required_parameters.name: device
required_parameters.description: This is the type of device to download the app for. Allowed values: "apple|android|chrome".

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/createApp/1/apple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/createApp/{id}/{device}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Certificate
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to retrieve his uploaded iOS and Android certificates and keys for a specific app. Returns the binary file or a string with the password.

required_parameters.name: device
required_parameters.description: This is the type of device to download the certificate for. Allowed values: "apple|android".

required_parameters.name: element
required_parameters.description: Required when device = "apple". This is the certificate element the user asks for. If the element passed is "p12" or "mobileprovision" a binary file will be returned; if it is "pwd" the password used to generate the .p12 file will be returned. Possible values: "p12|mobileprovision|pwd".

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/getKey/1/apple/p12"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/getKey/{id}/{device}/{element}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Set Adv Status

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create App
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to create a new app. Returns the newly created app ID or "false".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/createApp2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/createApp2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Is Building App
api_list.description: Allows a user to verify if the building process for his app, launched through Build App, is completed. Returns a JSON object with "is_building" boolean key.

required_parameters.name: device
required_parameters.description: This is the type of device to download the app for. Allowed values: "apple|android|chrome".

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/isBuilding/1/apple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/isBuilding/{id}/{device}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Logout AppsBuilder User
api_list.description: Allows an existing and logged in user to logout on the AppsBuilder website. Notice: this function acts on AppsBuilder platform, not on CMS.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/auth/logout"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Sent Messages
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to retrieve the previously sent push notification messages for on of his apps, specifying the number of results to be shown.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: This is the number of push notification messages to be shown.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/push/story/1/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/push/story/{id}/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get App Quality
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to retrieve the quality of an app based on an AppsBuilder rating. Returns a number, which must be considered a percentage.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/quality/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/quality/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Themes
api_list.description: Allows a user to retrieve the list of available themes. Returns an hash of Themes.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Enable App Auth
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to turn on an access control on one of his apps.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/setAuthInternal/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/app/setAuthInternal/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Last Building Infos
api_list.description: Allows an user to retrieve the informations about the last app building process (success, errors, and so on). Returns a JSON with multiple keys.

required_parameters.name: device
required_parameters.description: This is the type of device to download the app for. Allowed values: "apple|android|chrome".

api_list.name: Get App
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to download the compiled package of one of his apps, for a specific device type. Returns the app binary file.

required_parameters.name: device
required_parameters.description: This is the type of device to download the app for. Allowed values: "apple|android|chrome".

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/getApp/1/apple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com/builder/getApp/{id}/{device}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Disable App Auth
api_list.description: Allows an existing user to turn off access control on one of his apps.

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "appsbuilder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
